name: HelpText
description: The HelpText module provides functions for displaying and hiding help text messages on the player's screen. It supports various text UI systems.

clientFunctions.name: HideHelpText
clientFunctions.description: Hides the currently displayed help text message.
clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Hide any currently displayed help text
Bridge.HelpText.HideHelpText()

clientFunctions.name: ShowHelpText
clientFunctions.description: Displays a help text message on the screen at the specified position.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The help text message to display

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position on screen (top, center, bottom, etc.)

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Show help text at default position
Bridge.HelpText.ShowHelpText("Press [E] to interact")

-- Show help text at specific position
Bridge.HelpText.ShowHelpText("Hold [F] to enter vehicle", "center")

serverFunctions.name: HideHelpText
serverFunctions.description: Hides help text for a specific player.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: Player server ID to hide help text for

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Hide help text for specific player
Bridge.HelpText.HideHelpText(source)

serverFunctions.name: ShowHelpText
serverFunctions.description: Shows help text to a specific player.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: Player server ID to show help text to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The help text message to display

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position on screen (top, center, bottom, etc.)

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Show help text to specific player
Bridge.HelpText.ShowHelpText(source, "Welcome! Press [F1] for help")

-- Show help text at bottom of screen
Bridge.HelpText.ShowHelpText(source, "You are now in a safe zone", "bottom")
